problem.title: CheckPoint: Block on Spring
problem.script: m = random.randrange(40, 80, 5)/100 vmax = random.randrange(12, 18, 1)/10 amax = random.randrange(12, 45, 1)/100 T = 2*3.14159 * vmax / amax A = vmax* vmax/ amax d = A/(math.sqrt(2)) x = math.sqrt(2/3)* A
problem.p: A block of mass m = $m kg is connected to a spring. The block is in simple harmonic motion during which its maximum velocity is vmax = $vmax m/s and its maximum acceleration is amax = $amax m/s^2.
Part 1. Find the period of oscillations.
Part 2. Find the amplitude of the oscillations.
Part 3. How far is the block from equilibrium at the moment when its kinetic energy equals to its potential energy? Assume that potential energy is zero at equilibrium.
Part 4. How far is the block from equilibrium at the moment when its kinetic energy equals to one-third of its maximum kinetic energy? Assume that potential energy is zero at equilibrium.
